|brand = BreezeCOM |model = PC-DS.11 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (16-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 0268 |device_id = 0002 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = LKT-PC-DS11,OGD10330209 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = VLSI;VPS10101-3; |chip2 = Harris;HFA3860; |chip3 = Harris;HFA3624; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/07/1999 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== * FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/LKT-PC-DS11 LKT-PC-DS11] ([[:Category:Alvarion|Alvarion]] Technologies, Ltd.) : [[Harris]] HFA3680B [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=62076 Test Report] ([[:Category:BreezeCOM|BreezeCOM]], Inc.) * FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/OGD10330209 OGD10330209] ([[No Wires Needed]]) : Model: '''Swallow 1100''', '''Falcon 1100'''
==See also== * FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/IMRWLPCE24H IMRWLPCE24H] ([[Lucent]]/[[Agere]]) :[[Alvarion BreezeNET PC-DS.11b]] ([[Lucent PC24E-H-FC]]) * FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/IMRWLPC24H IMRWLPC24H] ([[Lucent]]/[[Agere]]) :[[Apple AirPort Classic]] ([[Lucent PC24-H-FC]])
===Models=== * FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/LKT-DS11 LKT-DS11] ([[:Category:Alvarion|Alvarion]]/[[:Category:BreezeCOM|BreezeCOM]]) : [[BreezeCOM AP-DS.11]] Wireless Access Point : [[BreezeCOM SA-DS.11]] Wireless Station Adapter : [[BreezeCOM WBS-DS.11]] Wireless Bridge Server : [[BreezeCOM WBC-DS.11]] Wireless Bridge Client * FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/OGD10310308 OGD10310308] ([[No Wires Needed]]) : Model: '''Parrot 1100''' - [[Compaq WL400]]
===[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=48119 Partlist]=== Faber Electronics PC1100PCB - 6-layer epoxy PCB *VLSI VPS10101-3 - CPU ARM uC Ruby II (TQFP144, U1; 1) :General Purpose PCMCIA controller (w/ 32-bit ARM6 core) *AMD AM29F010-55EC - Memory Flash 128k x 8 (TSOP I, Y-3 32, U2; 1) *IDT IDT71016S20PH - Memory SRAM 64k x 16 20ns (TSOP II, Z44) *Harris HFA3860 IV - Wireless/RF Baseband processor (TQFP-48, U4; 1) *Harris HFA3624 IA - Wireless/RF Prescalar, IF/RF (SSOP-28, U16; 1) *Harris HFA3724 IN - Wireless/RF Mod/Demod (TQFP-80, U8; 1) *Harris HFA3524 IA - Wireless/RF Synth (TSSOP-20, U9; 1) *Harris HFA3424 IB - Wireless/RF LNA (SOIC-8, U10; 2) *Harris HFA3424 IB - Wireless/RF LNA (SOIC-8, U13) *Harris HFA3925 IA96 - Wireless/RF PA (SSOP-28, U15; 1) *Macom SW-356 - Switch RF 2.4-2.5GHz (SOIC-8, U28; 1) *Harris ICL7660 SIBA-T - Linear Super voltage converter (SOIC-8, U17; 1) <!-- *Motorola KXN1332A - Freq Control VCO 2.1GHz (SMT U26; 1) *Murata LFJ30-03B2442B084 - Filter RF 2442MHz (SMT, U19; 2) *Murata LFJ30-03B2442B084 - Filter RF 2442MHz (SMT, U20) *Philips BFR505 - Transistor BJT-NPN 9GHz Wideband (SOT-23, Q1; 1) *Raltron CO48025-44.000 - Freq Control Oscillator 44MHz, 5V 25ppm (SMT, U5; 1) *Raltron CO48025-33.000 - Freq Control Oscillator 33MHz, 5V 25ppm (SMT, K3; 1) *Raltron CO43025-22.000 - Freq Control Oscillator 22MHz, 3.3V 25ppm (SMT, U11; 1) *Radiall R199 005 800 - Connector Coaxial RF, MC Card (SMT U27; 1) *ITT Cannon 121582-0000 - Connector PC Card 68 pins (SMT, K1; 1) *International Rectifiers IRLML6302 - MOSFET HEXFET Power (SOT-23, U14; 2) *International Rectifiers IRLML6302 - MOSFET HEXFET Power (SOT-23, U38) -->
